metadata.title: CVE-2017-3164 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: Server Side Request Forgery in Apache Solr, versions 1.3 until 7.6 (inclusive). Since the "shards" parameter does not have a corresponding whitelist mechanism, a remote attacker with access to the server could make Solr perform an HTTP GET request to any reachable URL.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
